welcome: Welcome to Rajac Language School Admission
instructions: Fill out the admission form below.
qrHint: Scan to open the admission portal

home.title: Welcome To Rajac International Schools
home.description: Welcome to our admission portal. Please choose your access level below.

outlook.title: Book Your Admission Test Slot
outlook.saveError: Could not save your test slot. Please try again.
outlook.calendarNote: This test slot will be reflected in your Outlook calendar soon.

admin.search: Search by Father's Name or Student Name...

success.title: Account Created
success.reminder: Please take a screenshot or photo of this screen.
success.note: You will need these credentials when your son is approved

dashboard.title: Parent Dashboard
dashboard.passedMessage: Congratulations! Please bring original documents for verification at the school.
dashboard.failedMessage: We appreciate your interest. Please check admin notes for further information.
dashboard.reviewMessage: Your application is being reviewed. Please check back for updates on your exam schedule and results.

form.title: Admission Form
form.thankYou: Thank you! Your application has been received.

student.parentId: Parent Passport/ID (جواز سفر ولي الأمر / رقم بطاقة ولي الأمر)

siblings.name: Name (الاسم)
siblings.studentHere: Student in your school? (طالب في رجاءك؟)

initial.title: For Initial Admission Stage (رياض الأطفال):
initial.birthCert: Original national ID birth certificate (شهادة الميلاد الرقم القومي - الأصل)
initial.photos: 6 personal photos of the student (6 صور شخصية للطالب)
initial.parentIds: Copy of father's and mother's national ID (صورة من البطاقة الوالد و الوالدة)

transfer.title: For Transfer Student:
transfer.above: All of the above documents plus the following (جميع الطلبات السابقة و الآتية):
transfer.transferRequest: Transfer request from the previous school (طلب تحويل من المدرسة المحول منها)
transfer.transcript: Transcript of previous years from educational administration (بيان نجاح بالأعوام السابقة لمراحل النقل من الإدارة التعليمية)
transfer.advancedTranscript: Transcript of advanced level (بيان نجاح المستوى الرفيع)
transfer.grade6Cert: Certificate of 6th grade (شهادة الصف السادس الابتدائي)
transfer.grade6Confirm: Confirmation of 6th grade completion from the educational administration (بيان نجاح الصف السادس الابتدائي من الإدارة التعليمية)
transfer.middleConfirm: Confirmation of middle school completion from the educational administration (بيان نجاح الإعدادية من الإدارة التعليمية)
